domain.name: Person

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes Do you think it may be that your definition of 'work' is other people's leisure time? Watching TV, tweeting personal insults at the media, 'executive time'? Camping in front of cameras insulting people? Not work. When was the last time you sat in on a COVID-19 task force meeting?
